name: Hisshou 777 Fighter: Pachi-Slot Ryugu Densetsu
overview: Hisshou 777 Fighter: Pachi-Slot Ryugu Densetsu ("Victory 777 Fighter: Pachi-Slot Sea Dragon Palace Legend" is a pachi-slot game. It contains four machines the player can virtually gamble on, as well as a two-player multiplayer mode in which the two players compete to earn the most credits in a brief time limit. It was followed by two sequels, both for the Super Famicom: Hisshou 777 Fighter 2: Pachi-Slot Hi Jouhou and Hisshou 777 Fighter III.
